author: schor
msg: No Jira - CVD.bat failed because space missing between
two parameters.  Added the space, and now it launches.

author: wrowe
msg: Do not register methods for LIMIT that do not trigger auth (e.g. FTP_NEED_LOGIN).
Add NOOP to this list of commands-without-authentication.  Make NOOP a true noop.

author: snicoll
msg: Fixes announcement template to handle actions per types.

author: kwsutter
msg: OPENJPA-119.  Needed to allow the EM.clear operation to perform without doing an implicit flush.  Introduced a new boolean
parameter to indicate whether a flush is desired or not.  This allows both the new (correct) behaviour for JPA as well as the
old behaviour for other persistence personalities (JDO, etc).  I also introduced a new testcase for this scenario, and updated
